entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Uranium City
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
